content.text: We are located in the historic center of Rosia Montana 331, in a heritage house, that was a bank, medical center, cinema and then our grandparents who worked in mining industry used it for living. We preserved the painting, the wooden floor, the windows, the heating with terracotta stoves and we added new bathrooms and kitchen so now we offer accommodation, guided tours and bikes. The rooms (houses) have separate entries from a common yard with hammocks, gazebo, green grass and a nice view to the Cânic massif.

In the past here was a bank with one meter wide stone walls, where the miners changed the gold in money and dynamite. Here can stay maximum 4 people (bunk beds) + private bathroom + kitchenette + library/board games + wifi + heating with terracotta stove + green yard with hammock/gazebo/barbecue + sleight/bikes to rent

This place was the old summer house of our grandparents where can stay maximum 3 people (one double bed + one single) + private bathroom + well equipped kitchen + library/board games + wifi + heating with terracotta stove + green yard with hammock/gazebo/barbecue + sleight/bikes to rent

The 'tarnat' has 2 rooms with some old and well preserved characteristics: the access through 'tarant' (an external hallway with small windows), the almost 100 years old painting and some small exhibits. Here can stay maximum 6 people (each room has 1 double + 1 single bed) + private bathroom + kitchenette + library/board games + wifi + heating with terracotta stove + green yard with hammock/gazebo/barbecue + sleight/bikes to rent
